column4: when i put in a usb drive it says i'm not privlidged to mount it. i tried running sudo mount /dev/usb with no results.
can someone help me figure out why i'm not privileged enough to mount usb sticks?
What is the file system- ntfs? and normally with my Ubuntu I stick a stick in and it automounts it
I tried with a few different file systems, currently i believe it's fat32 and it did use to automount, not anymore
